p: Part of this study was carried out in Takuara village, located in the municipality of Juti, Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil. The residents who participated of process of larvae collection has given written informed consent to publish case details. Authorization for the collection of R. palmarum larvae was granted by Mrs. JÃºlia Cavalheiro, the matriarch and leader of the Takuara village. The field studies did not involve endangered or protected species.
